definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the remaining or leftover portion of something, typically after a division, subtraction, or consumption has taken place. It is often used to describe the residual part of a whole, such as the remaining time, quantity, or amount. Additionally, it can also denote a break or pause in an activity or a period of relaxation.

examples.german: Ich brauche etwas Ruhe und Erholung
examples.english: I need some rest and relaxation

examples.german: Es sind nur noch wenige Restplätze verfügbar
examples.english: There are only a few remaining seats available

examples.german: Der Rest des Tages war sehr entspannt
examples.english: The rest of the day was very relaxed

examples.german: Kannst du den Rest des Geldes bitte zurückgeben?
examples.english: Can you please return the rest of the money?
